#!/bin/zsh
# use ffmpeg to cut an mp4 into two parts at a specified time, 
# for example, at 00:00:08.000. 
# hh:mm:ss is the time to cut the video
Time="00:39:10"
video="{clipboard}"
# remove '.mp4' from the end of the video name
video_name="${video%.mp4}"
output_part1="${video_name}_part1.mp4"
output_part2="${video_name}_part2.mp4"

ffmpeg -i "$video"  -t $Time -c copy "$output_part1"
ffmpeg  -ss $Time -i "$video"  -c copy "$output_part2"
alfredsnippet.name: Video Cut- Split by time(into two parts)
